thread.title: Hard Lessons from ‘Relationship Realities’ Shared in New Book
thread.title_full: Hard Lessons from ‘Relationship Realities’ Shared in New Book

author: Marketing Services
title: Hard Lessons from ‘Relationship Realities’ Shared in New Book
text:
Darrell James gives a guide and a boon to couples everywhere, from new lovers to pairs who have been steady for quite some time. His book collects lessons and romantic wisdom based on “ Relationship Realities ” (published by Xlibris), providing readers with ways to strengthen their bonds with their loved ones. “Relationship Realities” is a book consisting of several years of intense relationship research , several years of conversations on the topic, lots of personal thought and experiences, several conferences and workshops, as well as sharing and many hours spent in coaching others with relationship issues . This book grasps a truth of reality of what can happen in relationships.
“After doing intense work with others as related to their relationships and seeing most of them improve. I realized that a lot of relationships suffered out of not knowing how to improve them. I wanted to do something to start to give others ideas to improve their relationships in hope of seeing an overall less drop in negative relationships,” James says. My book is about some of the Realities that can occur in Relationships if we go into them with little to no expectations. It will help you understand that Relationships have a much better chance at being successful when we don’t carry over negative experiences and baggage from our past ones. Hopefully the book will give you insight on tools needed to ensure a positive and nurturing relationship.”
With these lessons gained from “Relationship Realities,” couples can face the uncertain future together, equipped with the advice James has provided them.
“Relationship Realities”
By Darrell James
Hardcover | 6 x 9in | 82 pages | ISBN 9781503599574
Softcover | 6 x 9in | 82 pages | ISBN 9781503599581
E-Book | 82 pages | ISBN 9781503599567
Available at Amazon and Barnes & Noble
About the Author
Darrell James currently resides in Columbus, although born in Chicago and raised in Ft. Mitchell, Alabama. He is one of 10 children raised by very strong, God-fearing, and saved parents, Bishop Prince James and Evang. Izola James, both now deceased. Aside from being a writer, he is also a photographer; a life coach with specialties in women empowerment coaching, relationship coaching, and youth behavior coaching; a relationship expert; and an inspirational/motivational speaker. He is available for workshops, speaking engagements, and conferences. He can be contacted through e-mail, darrellj35(at)aol(dot)com, or through his website, darrelljames.org.
Xlibris Publishing, an Author Solutions, LLC imprint, is a self-publishing services provider created in 1997 by authors, for authors. By focusing on the needs of creative writers and artists and adopting the latest print-on-demand publishing technology and strategies, we provide expert publishing services with direct and personal access to quality publication in hardcover, trade paperback, custom leather-bound and full-color formats. To date, Xlibris has helped to publish more than 60,000 titles. For more information, visit xlibris.com or call 1-888-795-4274 to receive a free publishing guide.
